location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paperDimensions: 715 x 584 mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the area of Khuzestan surrounding DarraKhazinah [Darkhazineh] on the Karun River, and the hills to the north, near the villages of Abgah and Batwand [Batvand].The map indicates hydrology, settlements, relief (shown by hachures), pipelines, roads and routes, power stations and telephone stations.The map was printed by General Staff India.
